data.title: David TALAGA on LinkedIn: #freedom #stopwarinukraine
data.meta_description:
What does the Ukrainian flag mean?
The blue and yellow horizontal stripes symbolize the blue sky over the wheat fields in the steppes.

"This is huge! ğŸš€ Just days after the EU AI Act announcement, Dataiku is ready to fast-track compliance for organizations. This achievement is the result of many years of expertise in #AIgovernance and regulatory knowledge, establishing Dataiku as a key player in AI Governance. Now is not the time to wait until the last minute; compliance is not a sprint but a marathon that requires preparation and organization to reach the finish line and wisely avoid regulatory penalties.ğŸƒâ™‚ï¸ğŸ’¨ And the good news is that a series of ai governance webinars is just around the corner. ğŸ˜ Congratulations to the Product & Solutions Team !
